descriptionHtml:
The Dovakiin's Manor

*Keep in mind that this is my first mod

---------------------------------------------
S T A R T I N G   O U T
---------------------------------------------
Go to Whiterun and go to the stairs of the Sky Forge. 
Look to your left near the top of the stairs and you
will see the entry to Dovakiin's Manor.

---------------------------------------------
F E A T U R E S
---------------------------------------------
This mod includes the following;
()The Guardian Forge()
()A large sized manor() *Interior not done yet

Version: 1.0
Updated 7/21/15

Please give me suggestions below!
author: ArrowToTheKnees
